Room.Name: Llanandar Village
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the main path through a quaint and charming little village.
Room.LongDescription: There seems to be a village square in the middle of a small clearing. A great many elven folk are busy doing their daily chores, and most simply ignore you as they go about their business. A sign post points west, but you cannot read the language. The houses seem to be built into living trees in the oak forest around you.
